message: There may not be a war in the US, but people are armed and ready. Then, a bully kills a bunch of innocent kids in a school or innocent people in a night club, and we get the same reaction """" pray for Orlando"""" , or whatever, until the next mass murder. Than will answer with the """"pray for"""" hashtag, and the real issues are never addressed.

Buddhist Terrorists' Destruction of Muslim Properties A group of Buddhist terrorists destroyed a Mosque, a Madarasa (religious school) and many Muslim houses in Thurae Thamin village, Woa township, Bago Division on 23rd June 2016. The destruction was carried out by the terrorist group (particularly Ma Ba Tha and 969 organizations) in broad day with the Buddhist Flag clearly visible in the background. Attacks, destructions and invasions of Muslim and Christianian properties and buildings are on the rise under the new so-called Democratic Government led by Aung San Suu Kyi. The government has so far not arrested or condemned the Buddhist fundamentalists and terrorists who continue to aggressively attack other religions across Myanmar.
